programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: The former steeplejack recalls the golden age of shipbuilding, examining the skills of engineers who turned Britain into one of the leading manufacturing nations, and visits Bristol to pay tribute to his personal hero Isambard Kingdom Brunel. He also travels to Scotland for a voyage on the paddle steamer Waverley

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Liz McIvor presents a documentary examining class divisions on trains, with separate carriages for first, second and third class passengers. Over time, trains acted as a catalyst, with people travelling to regions and places for the first time, as well as changing the nations relationship with royalty and developing a stronger sense of shared identity and culture

programme.title: Tutankhamun: The Truth Uncovered
programme.desc: What killed Tutankhamun? Ever since the tomb of the boy king was discovered in 1922, he has become arguably the most famous pharaoh of all ancient Egypt. But his mysterious death at just 19 years of age has never been explained. Now, Dallas Campbell reveals new scientific research aimed at getting to the truth. A CT scan of the pharaohs mummified body creates a full-size image of the real Tutankhamun, while DNA analysis uncovers a shocking secret about his family background - and the genetic trail leads to a revolutionary new theory about his sudden and unexpected death

programme.title: Thatcher: A Very British Revolution
programme.desc: Margaret Thatchers victory in the 1979 general election propels her into power as Britains first female prime minister, but her first two years are characterised by disruption and division. Her first cabinet is split between a small group aligned with her plans for radical change, but the majority are experienced ministers who prefer a more consensual style of politics. She also has to deal with an economy in deep trouble, with inflation rising, unemployment spiralling and public spending growing

programme.title: William Nicholson Remembers - Sweet As You Are
programme.desc: Acclaimed screenwriter William Nicholson looks back on the BBC drama he still considers one of his finest achievements, 1985s As Sweet As You Are. With extracts from the diaries he wrote throughout the production, Nicholson shares how he was inspired to tackle the subject matter. He explains how his research saw him undergoing his own AIDS test, an experience that confirmed for him that this was a story that needed to be told

programme.title: Screen Two
programme.desc: A married lecturer discovers he is HIV-positive after an extra-marital one night stand. After he tells his wife, she is forced to cope with his infidelity and the fact he has put her in danger of contracting the virus herself. Drama, starring Liam Neeson and Miranda Richardson

programme.title: Ardal OHanlon: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: The actor explores some of the most important archaeological finds in Irelands history, revealing how many have been used as an important tool for nation-building on both sides of the border. Speaking to world-renowned experts, he unravels a forgotten time period, when a team of Americans from Harvard University, a Nazi archaeologist from Austria, and a Welsh geography professor dug up ancient sites across the country. Their pioneering work answered questions about the Celts, and what it means to be Irish

programme.title: How to Get Ahead
programme.desc: Documentary in which writer and broadcaster Stephen Smith finds out what it took to survive and prosper in the most artistic and decadent royal courts in history. He begins with Richard II, who cultivated the first truly artistic court in England. Painters, sculptors, poets, tailors, weavers and builders flocked there to make their fortunes, but these were dangerous times, and getting close to Richard brought many to a sticky end. Featuring contributions by David Tennant and Clarissa Dickson-Wright

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: The former steeplejack recalls the golden age of shipbuilding, examining the skills of engineers who turned Britain into one of the leading manufacturing nations, and visits Bristol to pay tribute to his personal hero Isambard Kingdom Brunel. He also travels to Scotland for a voyage on the paddle steamer Waverley

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation

Over time, trains acted as a catalyst, with people travelling to regions and places for the first time, as well as changing the nations relationship with royalty and developing a stronger sense of shared identity and culture

programme.title: Thatcher: A Very British Revolution
programme.desc: Margaret Thatchers victory in the 1979 general election propels her into power as Britains first female prime minister, but her first two years are characterised by disruption and division. Her first cabinet is split between a small group aligned with her plans for radical change, but the majority are experienced ministers who prefer a more consensual style of politics. She also has to deal with an economy in deep trouble, with inflation rising, unemployment spiralling and public spending growing

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Building of Britain
programme.desc: Fred uncovers the construction techniques of stonemasons and carpenters through the ages, focusing on Norman cathedrals. The former steeplejack admires Peterborough Cathedral and Rochester Castle, where he demonstrates how tactics used to invade the fortress centuries ago resemble todays demolition methods

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Building of Britain
programme.desc: The ex-steeplejack tours the coast of north Wales, visiting Harlech, Caernarfon and Beaumaris to admire the defensive features of the strongholds that helped Edward I subdue the Welsh. On the orders of the king, French architect Master James of St Georges revolutionised castle design in England

programme.title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
programme.desc: Two notorious outlaws routine of bank and train robberies is cut short when a seemingly unstoppable posse is formed to catch them. The pair plan to flee America and start a new life in Bolivia, with the Sundance Kids schoolmistress lover in tow - but staying ahead of the law is not so easy. Western, starring Paul Newman, Robert Redford and Katharine Ross

programme.title: Talking Pictures
programme.desc: An insight into the life of the Hollywood actor, who is one of the screens greatest heart-throbs, featuring rarely seen interviews that reveal he was much more than just a pin-up. Narrated by Sylvia Syms

programme.title: All the Presidents Men
programme.desc: The true story of Washington Post reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein, who persevered in their investigation of the links between the Watergate break-in and the White House, a scandal that eventually forced the resignation of President Nixon. Alan J Pakulas drama, starring Robert Redford, Dustin Hoffman, Jason Robards and Hal Holbrook

programme.title: Rachels Farm
programme.desc: Film director and actress Rachel Ward joins a farming revolution. She voyages from willful ignorance about the ecological impacts of conventional agriculture on her own rural property, to embracing a movement to restore the health of Australias farmland, food and climate

programme.desc: Rav Wilding and Jennifer Reoch hear about the anti-terrorism police hunt for a satanist believed to be inciting others to cause harm. They also appeal for help in solving the murder of 75-year-old John Murray, who was attacked at his London home last October

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: The team reports on three sets of developers taking on three very different auction properties in London and Wolverhampton, with hammer prices ranging from just over £100,000 to nearly half a million. Time will tell whether all three investors will deliver stunning renovations

programme.desc: Charlie Ross presents from Hele, near Exeter, where experts Caroline Hawley and John Cameron steer the red and blue teams towards the best items and battle it out at auction in Bristol. Charlie monitors progress of the contest and also discovers a link between Strictly Come Dancing, the Mars landing and a 19th-century inventor

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Alan Carr aims to transform the medieval tower room into a movie theatre inspired by Cinema Paradiso, while co-renovator Amanda Holden tries to turn the damp-ridden cellar carved out of the mountains rockface into a wine grotto. Hitting a brick wall with their ideas, Alan takes Amanda to the Guicciardini Strozzi Casona winery to sample their world-famous beverages. Later, Alan gets to work creating a bespoke seating area, giving the entrance hall a much-needed makeover. Amanda builds a path to access the cellar, but discovers the rocky floor acts as a drain for water overflowing from the mountain

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A couple hope their £400,000 budget will buy them a slice of rural bliss in Moray in Scotland, where Jules Hudson is eager to show them the very best property on offer. Jules also chats to some of the residents of an award-winning village recognised as a world leader for sustainable and holistic community living

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Painting conservator Lucia Scalisi uses her skills to honour a racing legend, and a mechanical doll needs the expert skills of toy restorers Julie Tatchell and Amanda Middleditch

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: After yesterdays finalists moved on, two fresh faces enter the Inner Circle, ready to shake things up and make their mark. Only two will make it to the dramatic final, where they face the ultimate showdown: split or shaft? Will they choose to split their combined prize money, or will one player attempt to take it all, leaving the other with nothing? Quiz show, hosted by Amanda Holden

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong and Trevor Nelson co-host the quiz in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A special episode of the historical sketch show, featuring all your favourite songs from the series! Sing along with King Alfred about his burnt cakes, or with Henry VIII about his love of reformation - or get down Norman-style with William the Conqueror. With, of course, our host Rattus to guide the way!

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Historical characters and events are explored in sketches and quizzes based on the books by Terry Deary. Comedy talent including Sarah Hadland, Steve Punt and Meera Syal help bring the strange facts, gory battles and crazy inventions to life

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson subjects the Skoda Yeti to a thorough examination, while Richard Hammond charts the evolution of the Porsche 911 by pitting a modern Turbo S cabriolet against its oldest relative the Volkswagen Beetle - and the power of gravity. James May takes the Ariel Atom V8 for a spin on the test track, and comedian John Bishop receives tuition from the Stig before getting behind the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Stacey and Joe
programme.desc: Teddy has made it through the crucial post-operative phase and is allowed to come home from the vet. With an already hectic work and home life, how will Stacey and Joe adapt to caring for a poorly pooch? Joe arrives back home, only to be left with a long list of jobs by Stacey, who also has a new beehive. But the most exciting thing are the Baftas, for which Stacey has been nominated in two categories. Will she be bringing any trophies back to Pickle Cottage?

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: Dwayne reaches breaking point as he struggles to cope with accumulating pressures. Stella finds it hard to separate the personal from the professional as she makes a ruthless decision in the wake of last weeks devastating events. Corals high hopes of a job-share are quickly dashed when Nishas actions leave her in the lurch

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: The staff and students swap the school for the estate as a community clean?up brings back familiar faces - though not everything goes to plan when some cave in to temptation. Desperation drives Schuey back to his criminal past, with disastrous consequences for Mike, and Noel is left reeling from a revelation by Stace

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Documentary following boxer Tommy Furys return to the ring. Tommy is at his lowest point personally and professionally, living alone in a house that was meant to be his and partner Molly-Maes forever home. His role as a father to baby Bambi brings both joy and pressure as he tries to convince Molly-Mae he is a changed man. After finally getting the medical all-clear to fight again, Tommy and his trainer and father John prepare for his return to the ring against MMA fighter Darren Till. Team Fury travels to the press conference - with John promising to be on his best behaviour

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommy prepares for his first gym appearance since announcing his comeback, but with fighter Darren Till throwing threats and chaos into the mix, trainer John pulls Tommy out of the fight claiming he is unwilling to risk his sons future career. Its a crushing blow for Tommy, whos desperate for momentum and purpose. Amid the pressure, theres a flicker of hope - Tommy and partner Molly-Mae Hague are spotted together on New Years Eve, with a kiss that hints at a brighter future

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommys fight for redemption continues, but this time, its a battle for his own mind. Struggling to secure a new opponent, he knows a comeback fight is crucial for his mental health. Meanwhile, Molly-Maes new series trailer drops, pushing Tommy to face his own truths in the toughest interview of his life, where he opens up about his battle with alcohol addiction. Back in training, hope returns as a potential fight looms, leading him and his father John to a career-defining meeting

programme.title: Film Club
programme.desc: Drama, starring Aimee Lou Wood and Nabhaan Rizwan as best friends retreating from reality into a world of movies. However, change is coming to their lives whether they like it or not

programme.title: Film Club
programme.desc: While Noa attends a taster day for his new job in Bristol, Evie pulls out all the stops for Film Club - theres a lot riding on tonight. Drama, starring Aimee Lou Wood and Nabhaan Rizwan

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy searches for the yacht Sarm vanished from, and tracks down Ryan Banes ex-wife, hearing first-hand about her experiences while married to him

programme.title: Blackmailed: The Sextortion Killers
programme.desc: Reporter Tir Dhondy investigates the rise of sextortion scams targeting teenage boys on social media, including the case of 16-year-old victim Evan Boettler. Her journey leads to Nigeria, where she confronts the scammers taking part in these crimes. With unprecedented access and interviews with industry insiders, Tir exposes a disturbing online underworld and its devastating consequences

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Christopher Columbus tries to teach a class the world is shaped like a pear, and Arctic explorer Peter Freuchen has to dig his way out of snow with a frozen poo

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Henry VIII enlists the help of Maître d Fred Sirieix as he tries to find the right wife on Historic First Dates, while Renaissance men try to impress the ladies

programme.title: EastEnders Investigates: The Manosphere
programme.desc: An investigation into the issues of misogyny and toxic masculinity, to coincide with the current EastEnders storyline centred on teenager Joel Marshall, played by Max Murray

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Mike approaches Alison to discuss their finances following the loss of their BandB business. However, his wife is preoccupied with plotting revenge on the ghosts for April Fools Day and recruits a playful Humphrey to execute her plans. Meanwhile, Mike is shocked to find someone from their insurance company on his doorstep - an unannounced visit to check the details of the gatehouse fire. Can Mike convince her that lightning really can strike thrice? Supernatural comedy, starring Charlotte Ritchie, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Simon Farnaby

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The queens take on a hyperpop banger for the Girl Group challenge. Girls Aloud star Nadine Coyle joins RuPaul, Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon as a British-Jamaican film-maker facing the day-to-day struggles of being an independent creative trying to survive in London. Kwabena searches for his first directing job, but only finds scripts built on tired black stereotypes. With time running out, he considers whether to take any job or hold out for integrity. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon, Dani Moseley and Demmy Ladipo

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Kwabenas long-awaited break comes with Sin and Subterfuge, a radical colour-blind Regency drama. What at first feels like a dream project soon raises unsettling questions and Kwabena tries to find a solution. A spark with talented actress comes at the worst possible time when an old flame resurfaces. Meanwhile, Funmi and Maurice sharpen their airs and graces in a bid to secure Mayowa a place at the boroughs top nursery. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Kwabenas first day on set finds him working with his hero, legendary actor Rudolph Williams. Determined to support the veteran performer, his good intentions are tested by the relentless demands of the shoot. To make matters worse, Vanessa weighs heavily on his mind, after their run-in brings up feelings he struggles to ignore. Maurice and Funmi are called in by the nursery after an altercation between Mayowa and another child, but are surprised to find things arent as they first assumed. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon

programme.title: The Turning
programme.desc: A woman quits her teaching job to be a governess for a young heiress who witnessed her parents tragic deaths, and ends up also teaching the girls problematic brother after he is sent home from boarding school. The tutor has some strange, unexplainable experiences in the house and begins to suspect there is more to their story than meets the eye. Modern adaptation of Henry Jamess gothic horror 1898 novella The Turn of the Screw, starring Mackenzie Davis, Finn Wolfhard, Brooklynn Prince and Joely Richardson

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommy is hopeful that he could be fighting again soon, and he and Molly-Mae are spending more time together. programme.title: Fare Dodgers: At War with the Law
programme.desc: The hunt is on in Surrey for a suspect thought to have evaded close to £20,000 of fares in one of South Western Railways biggest ever fraud cases. programme.title: Traffic Cops

programme.title: Motorway Cops: Catching Britains Speeders

programme.title: Lord Mountbatten: Hero or Villain?
programme.desc: When Louis Mountbatten, the Queens cousin and Prince Philips uncle, was murdered by the IRA in 1979 he was lauded as a war hero, an elder statesman and a much-loved member of the royal family. But did the public perception disguise the truth? As a military leader he was responsible for significant loss of life, while as a statesman he was responsible for the badly planned and poorly executed partition of India, which still has repercussions today

The business in run by Dr Una Morris, a micro-managing owner who also works at a radiotherapy clinic next door, and is determined to introduce hospital-style techniques to the kitchen by sealing everything in plastic bags

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: The final couple in the experiment say I do and find an instant spark in a passionate ceremony. Meanwhile, in-laws visits continue, and one bride gets a grilling from a frustrated friend over her treatment of her husband

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: A Totally Fun Thing That Bart Will Never Do Again
programme.desc: Bart persuades his family to go on a cruise, and for once the Simpsons enjoy their holiday - Lisa bonds with other intelligent children while Marge and Homer get some rare time alone. But when Bart embarks on an inspired yet morally dubious plan to prolong the trip indefinitely, things take a turn for the worse. With the guest voices of Steve Coogan and Treat Williams

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer finds himself in Marges bad books after ruining a night out, so when a head injury keeps him off work, he decides to use the time wisely and reflect on his marriage - and as luck would have it, movie star Stradivarius Cain is on hand to offer a few pearls of marital wisdom. With the guest voice of Bryan Cranston

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends compete in a scavenger hunt designed by Raj to test their scientific knowledge and life skills, but the game brings out the best and worst in everyone. As the hunt progresses, Howard and Amy begin to bond over their shared musical tastes, while Penny and Sheldon work together as a team and Bernadette becomes fiercely competitive

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon introduces Amy to Raiders of the Lost Ark - one of his favourite films - and is distraught when she ends up pointing out a plot hole that ruins the whole story. Meanwhile, Leonard realises he can manipulate Penny into feeling sorry for him when his mother publishes a reveal-all book about his childhood problems. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Johnny Galecki

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The family gathers at Jays ahead of Alexs graduation and stays longer than intended. Jay tries to conceal a Botox slip-up, Cameron is angered by Mitchs tendency to laugh at his expense and Claire feels emotional about the rate her children are growing up

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay wants nothing more than to have a quiet birthday out fishing on the lake, but the family take that as him wanting a big celebration, and in their frantic scramble to put everything together, Claire and Mitchell wind up trapped in the yard of their childhood home; Phil runs into his old college nemesis while at the mall with Gloria and Lily; Cameron gets himself into some hot water at the bakery, and the kids frantically do some creative editing on grandpas birthday video, all of which leaves Jay with a headache.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: There is a clash of personalities when Sheldon and Leonards mothers finally meet, while Howard finally decides to do his fair share of the housework - but not without a little help from his friends. Guest starring Christine Baranski and Laurie Metcalf

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon presses Leonard and Penny to choose a date for their wedding, while he also has to deal with dramatic changes in his own relationship with Amy. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny struggles with Leonards confession that he kissed another woman when he was away on his North Sea research expedition. After driving all the way to Las Vegas, she must now decide whether she wants to go through with the wedding. Back home, Sheldon doesnt know how to act after Amy tells him she wants them to take a relationship break

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard meets up with the woman he kissed during his trip in the hope of setting Pennys mind at ease, while Sheldon films a special episode of Fun with Flags after his break-up with Amy. Bernadette feels guilty about keeping a secret from Penny

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta invites his newly discovered half-sister Kate (New Girl star Nasim Pedrad) to come and stay with him in New York. However, when he and Santiago realise shes a bit of a nightmare, they must find a way to get her back home to Dallas as fast as possible

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: When a fire destroys Boyles food truck, Pimento unexpectedly shows up at the scene, working as an insurance investigator. Diaz helps Santiago to see that its fine to get excited about picking her wedding dress, while Gina and Jeffords coach Captain Holt in the art of social media. Comedy, starring Joe Lo Truglio and Jason Mantzoukas

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge breaks her leg in a skiing accident and has to recover in hospital - so Lisa volunteers to take over as head of the household until she is well again. Unfortunately, Bart and Homer prove so awkward and unhelpful that she is driven to desperate measures

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart sets out to save Homer from the embarrassing effects of his latest misfortune, and does so well he becomes convinced he possesses miraculous healing powers. Featuring the guest voice of Don Cheadle (Iron Man 2)

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: The final couple in the experiment say I do and find an instant spark in a passionate ceremony. Meanwhile, in-laws visits continue, and one bride gets a grilling from a frustrated friend over her treatment of her husband

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy is shocked at a revelation from Sheldon after she buys him a new laptop, while Raj sells out Leonard and Howard after they lie to their wives in order to attend an early screening of a movie. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: On a weekend cabin trip with Penny and Amy, Sheldon spills one of Leonards secrets, while Howard and Bernadette must draw a line when Raj goes overboard with pregnancy gifts. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart gets into trouble with the police for vandalising Flanders Beatles memorabilia, so Marge sends him on an organised activity scheme to make sure he is supervised at all times. Unfortunately, Homer is appointed team leader, and it is not long before things start to fall apart

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Maggie becomes obsessed with unlikely babysitter Moe - much to the dismay of Marge and Homer, who think he is an unsuitable role model and ban him from seeing her again

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer proposes to Marge for the second time when he discovers their marriage licence is invalid, but the ceremony does not proceed without a hitch. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta and Julie Kavner

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Eco-disaster looms in Springfield when Mr Burns launches a controversial fracking operation - and while Homer is more than happy to play accomplice to his boss, an outraged Lisa calls on the services of bigshot politician Maxine Lombard (voiced by two-time Oscar winner Jane Fonda) to shut Burns down. Against the odds, however, the opponents end up falling for one another

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Thirty four-year-old Dan, a construction manager from Essex putting a broken engagement behind him. He is partnered with 35-year-old Jess, a personal trainer whose love life is in need of a good workout. Twenty-five-year-old Emily from Leeds boasts a masters degree in law. Her date is rom-com-loving Yorkshire lad Ryan. Carpet salesman Nathan, 28, has been round the block and back again in his home town of Burnley. But he is here to turn over a new leaf. His date is retail assistant Chloe, 23, a Lancashire woman who hates a pushover and is looking for a man to challenge her

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on Squid Game, Strictly Come Dancing, The Mating Game, Family Fortunes and Boris Johnsons appearance on The Andrew Marr Show, with cameras capturing their instant reactions and the lively discussions

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on Im a Celebrity Get Me Out of Here!, Tiger King 2, An Audience with Adele, Michael McIntyres The Wheel, Close to Me, Inside Beverly Hills: The Land of the Rich and Famous, BBC/ITV News (Austria) and Newsnight (The PM). From November 2021

programme.title: Open House: The Great Sex Experiment
programme.desc: Claude and Amy head to the red room with resident Georgie, hoping to find the right blend between instant sexual gratification and deep emotional connections. Alex and Alana, a young couple with two young children, describe themselves as sexual adventurers and want to open up with like-minded others. However, Alana has a jealous streak, which she knows she must overcome

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer falls out with Marge over revelations contained in an old letter, and moves into the home of a gay couple who keep him happy by plying him with food. With the guest voice of Weird Al Yankovic

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family spends Christmas on a ranch, where Lisa falls in love with an older boy, and Homer and Bart help locals protesting against a dam built by industrious beavers. Featuring the guest voices of David Byrne, Jonathan Taylor Thomas and Andy Serkis

programme.title: Rick and Morty
programme.sub-title: Star Mort Rickturn of the Jerri
programme.desc: The duo embark upon a family adventure with an invisibility belt. Animated sitcom set in the world of a genius inventor and his less-than-genius grandson

programme.title: Robot Chicken: DC Comics
programme.desc: Robot Chicken characters join the DC Comics universe to poke fun at those with the most impressive powers - and the lesser ones who cant really be called superheroes

programme.title: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
programme.desc: Gary crashes the tender and worries about how much damage hes caused. Danni and Keith continue to flirt on the boat, and a cute host catches Dannis eye

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon disagree over whether to continue holding their regular Roommate Agreement meetings, with Leonard suggesting they are no longer required, while Sheldon believes they are still essential. As the pairs squabble quickly escalates into a full-blown argument, the rest of their friends turn up for a planned Game of Thrones viewing party, and end up taking sides in the dispute - resulting in two warring factions taking up residence in 4A and 4B. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang goes to a bar and runs into Pennys old boyfriend Zack, while Bernadette is left to spend the evening with Sheldon when she cannot go wine tasting with the others. Elsewhere, things do not go to plan when Raj introduces his new girlfriend, Claire. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Gloria insists on a night of salsa dancing with Jay, and Mitchell challenges Cameron to try to get an attractive womans number. Meanwhile, Phil builds a treehouse

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: An online video sets Cam on a quest to restore Fizbos good name, while Phil is in for a surprise when he meets his future stepbrother and Manny enlists Gloria, Claire and Haley for a read-through of his new play

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: A teenager is found with multiple stab wounds in the street near his home, an amateur tree surgeon is badly hurt when a branch falls on his leg and two schoolgirls are run over

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: The team treat a lorry driver trapped behind his twisted steering wheel and help is urgently required for a 12-year-old who appears to be drunk after drinking an unknown substance

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: The discovery of underwear on a canal bank sparks a risky missing persons search and a police incident ends in a fleeing car passenger jumping over a wall and breaking his leg

programme.title: 999 Rescue Squad
programme.desc: A major fire breaks out in a haulage depot in Brighouse and a serious accident at an illegal off-road biking site leads to a rider needing urgent hospital treatment

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Classic British sci-fi adventure starring Jon Pertwee. The Doctor finds himself in a parallel universe where the Inferno Project is policed by nefarious versions of his friends

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Classic British sci-fi adventure starring Jon Pertwee. The Doctor tries to warn the Inferno staff in the alternate universe that penetrating the Earths crust will end in disaster

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: UNIT attempts to penetrate Earths core in search of a vast energy source, and the Doctor tries to end the exile imposed upon him. Jon Pertwee stars

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Classic British sci-fi adventure starring Jon Pertwee. With the parallel universe doomed to destruction, the Doctor tries to escape the catastrophe - but he is not the only one

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Classic British sci-fi adventure starring Jon Pertwee. Having returned to his own universe, the Doctor must stop Stahlman before the Earth suffers the same fate as the parallel one

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Part one of four. In Jon Pertwees debut as the Time Lord he faces an evil race who plan to colonise Earth with plastic replicas of humans. Emerging disorientated from the Tardis after his forced regeneration, the enigmatic time traveller is found by his old UNIT friends - but they fail to recognise him in his new appearance

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Part two of four. Having escaped from hospital, The Doctor arrives at UNIT headquarters and tries to convince the Brigadier that the meteorites are alien and pose a threat. Meanwhile, the Autons go on a murderous spree and General Scobie has a nasty surprise at home. Jon Pertwee stars

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Part three of four. Ransome manages to escape from the plastics factory and alert UNIT, prompting the Doctor and the Brigadier to start an investigation

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo sets out on the first leg of a trip from London to Edinburgh aboard the Flying Scotsman, beginning at Kings Cross as he heads for York

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels from Blackpool to Manchester, along the way unveiling a monument to 87 railwaymen of the London and North Western Railway who died in the Great War

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: The naturalist ventures into uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries, encountering extraordinary wildlife and meeting remarkable people. To begin, Steve and a team of climbers and jungle survival experts head into the ancient landscape of South Americas Guiana Shield. This vast wilderness of pristine forests and towering table-top mountains is one of the most inaccessible terrains on the planet

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: The naturalist leads an expedition into an unexplored desert canyon in the Jebel Akhdar mountain range of Oman. With temperatures soaring, dehydration and heat stroke are a constant threat

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve and a team of kayakers head to the Himalayas to attempt to row down the last great unexplored river in Bhutan. But theres a reason it has never been attempted before - it runs through a steep gorge which, according to legend, drops off the face of the planet

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve and his team venture into the heart of Suriname, to kayak an unnamed river that will take them through a forest unchanged for millions of years. The region is so remote, it could conceal undiscovered natural wonders - and so it proves as the journey results in a surprise beyond their wildest dreams

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on the first leg of a journey from East Yorkshire to Caernarfon, beginning by travelling from the city of Hull to the North Yorkshire market town of Malton

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo picks up his rail journey from Warwick to Rye. In Reading, he traces the origins of education for workers and in Henley-on-Thames he slips into a launch to hear about the world-famous regatta. Afternoon tea on the bank offers a chance for Michael to hear about four heroes of early 20th-century literary classic The Wind in the Willows

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In picturesque Snowdonia, Michael Portillo braves the fastest zip line in the world - stretching 1,500 feet across a vast slate quarry as he begins the last leg of his journey to Caernarfon. En route, he also visits the home of British mountaineering, Pen y Gwryd, to hear how an Edwardian journalist and poet created a climbing community, which grew to include men who would conquer Everest in the 1950s

programme.title: The Wrong Box
programme.desc: Two elderly brothers each stand to inherit a fortune if the other dies first - but one of them is not prepared to leave anything to chance, and begins a series of disastrous attempts on his unsuspecting siblings life. However, when one of the pair appears to have really died, his nephews conspire to cover it up. Black comedy, with John Mills, Ralph Richardson, Michael Caine, Peter Cook and Dudley Moore

programme.title: 13 Rue Madeleine
programme.desc: Veteran officer Robert Sharkey is recruited to train a team of intelligence service agents. When one of them turns out to be a German mole, Sharkey feeds him misinformation to take back to the Gestapo. However, the rogue spy outsmarts his peers and murders an agent. Without time to recruit a replacement, Sharkey steps in to head a dangerous mission in the heart of Nazi-occupied France. Second World War thriller, with James Cagney, Richard Conte, Walter Abel, Frank Latimore and Annabella

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about the making of the Cold War espionage drama

programme.title: Barnacle Bill
programme.desc: The latest in a long line of seafarers tries to save a derelict Victorian pier from demolition by getting it registered as a vessel. Ealing comedy, starring Alec Guinness, Irene Browne, Maurice Denham and Lionel Jeffries

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: The ruler of the Persian empire vows to expand his realm by conquering Greece. The king of Sparta steps forward to defend his homeland and the other kingdoms of Greece, but when he is betrayed by a political council, he finds himself without an army and must fend off the vast invading army with a mere 300 warriors. Historical drama, starring Richard Egan, Ralph Richardson and Diane Baker

programme.title: Daddys Home
programme.desc: A mild-mannered man hopes for his wifes two children to view him as their father. His dreams of perfect family life are threatened by the return of their biological father, a charismatic, motorcycle-riding tough guy, and he pulls out all the stops to prove to his stepchildren that he can be just as cool. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg

programme.title: Stillwater
programme.desc: Unemployed Bill Baker travels from his home in Stillwater, Oklahoma to Marseille, France to visit his estranged daughter Allison, who was imprisoned five years earlier for a murder she claims she didnt commit. Confronted with an insurmountable language barrier, cross-cultural differences and maddening legal complexity, Baker decides to take matters into his own hands to exonerate his only child after failing to get Allisons case re-opened. Crime thriller, starring Matt Damon and Abigail Breslin

programme.title: Not Okay
programme.desc: An ambitious but misguided young woman desperate for friends and fame fakes a visit to Paris to upscale her social media presence. A terrifying incident takes place in the real world, which becomes a part of the imaginary trip and offers all the material she wants. After posing as a survivor of a deadly attack, she soon learns that online notoriety comes with a price. Comedy drama, starring Zoey Deutch and Mia Isaac

programme.title: Second Coming
programme.desc: A happily married woman is shocked to discover she is pregnant as it has been months since she slept with her husband. Afraid of her spouses reaction, she tries to keep the news to herself, but she cannot hide the truth indefinitely. Drama, starring Nadine Marshall, Idris Elba and Kai Francis Lewis

programme.title: Young Winston
programme.desc: Biopic of Winston Churchill, following the future prime ministers formative years. While working as a journalist, he travels to Africa to report on the Boer Wars, an assignment that leads to his incarceration in a prison camp. He escapes from captivity and returns to England to begin a political career. Directed by Richard Attenborough and starring Simon Ward, Anthony Hopkins, Anne Bancroft and Robert Shaw

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: When works of art start disappearing, stolen by a master thief, Father Brown attempts to catch the culprit and save his soul. Comedy drama, starring Alec Guinness, Joan Greenwood and Peter Finch

programme.title: Time Lock
programme.desc: A boy manages to get himself locked in a bank vault. With 63 hours before the device opens, the authorities are left facing a race against time to free the lad before he runs out of air. Thriller, starring Robert Beatty, Betty McDowall, Vincent Winter, Lee Patterson and a young Sean Connery in an early role

programme.title: The Black Arrow
programme.desc: A knight returning home from fighting in the Wars of the Roses returns home to discover his father has been murdered. A family friend fighting for the other side has been blamed for the crime, but the knight tries to prove his wicked uncle is responsible. Swashbuckling adventure based on Robert Louis Stevensons novel, starring Louis Hayward and Janet Blair

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: Unconventional submarine skipper Joe Glass is sent to investigate the torpedoing of US and Russian vessels. He winds up trying to rescue the Russian president, who has been kidnapped by a rogue general. Action thriller, starring Gerard Butler, Gary Oldman and Common

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Two marines based in Cuba stand accused of murdering a comrade-in-arms. Three Navy lawyers working on their defence unearth evidence that the soldiers may have been acting under orders, which points to a trail of corruption leading all the way to a top-ranking officer. Drama based on Aaron Sorkins stage play, starring Tom Cruise, Demi Moore, Kevin Pollack, Jack Nicholson, Kiefer Sutherland and Kevin Bacon

programme.title: Overlord
programme.desc: In 1944, a group of American soldiers land in an occupied French hamlet after their plane is destroyed by enemy fire. Their mission is to take out a heavily fortified Nazi radio tower hours before D-Day. However, they stumble across a mysterious Nazi lab where their bloodthirsty enemies are waiting for them. Action thriller from producer JJ Abrams, starring Jovan Adepo, Wyatt Russell and Mathilde Ollivier

programme.title: I Am Not a Witch
programme.desc: In a rural Zambian village, Shula, a taciturn, serious-looking pre-teen girl, is accused of witchcraft on the shaky basis that strange things have happened since she turned up out of the blue. But when Shula refuses to confirm or deny whether shes a witch, police officer Josephine contacts government official Mr Banda, who agrees to take care of her. Drama, starring Maggie Mulubwa and Nellie Munamonga. In Nyanja, Bemba and Tonga with English subtitles

programme.desc: The hospital has its hands full when a typhoid epidemic breaks out in the community. programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Matthew tells Graces boss about her affair with Carl, so to avoid suspension the police woman is given just 24 hours to reveal Tom Kings killer.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Grace quizzes Carl about the identity of his fathers killer but the repercussions of his answers threaten to have devastating effects.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Claire discovers Caseys address and takes Ashley off confront the woman she believes torched their home. Leanne considers going to a money lender.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Louisa decides to leave for Spain with baby James and says an awkward goodbye to Martin, but when he finds the scan of her brain, he spots a malformation and realises she could suffer a haemorrhage if she gets on the plane. Will the doctor make it to the airport in time? Meanwhile, Margaret reveals the real reason she has come to Portwenn, and disaster strikes at Bert and Jennifers engagement party when Caroline receives an electric shock

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Frankie accidentally injures a man attempting to steal his motorbike, but is stricken with guilt when the thief dies after crashing the vehicle. A woman being treated for severe burns disappears home, where Drs Ormerod and Weatherill discover her family secret, while Alun becomes obsessed by an expensive stereo system. With Scott Taylor, Robert Daws and Amy Robbins

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: The villagers close ranks when travellers pass through Aidensfield, and the already tense atmosphere becomes even more volatile when a bank robber goes on the run. Meanwhile, Greengrass is more concerned with making a killing on a pony and trap race - but he may not be able to outwit the Aidensfield police this time. David Essex guest stars, alongside Jason Durr and Bill Maynard

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A number of strange events take place at an empty house, giving Mike the idea that a runaway boy is hiding out in Aidensfield, and a chance meeting in the pub steers Bernie in the unlikely direction of the entertainment industry

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Paul continues to ignore his sister Nicola, but her dad Rodney decides its time to talk. Val convinces Jack to fight for his marriage to Diane.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Doug decides he wants to stay in the village and asks Pollard for work - despite Hilarys desire for them to go home. Paul refuses to forgive Nicola.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Claire still isnt convinced of Caseys innocence, and tries to catch her out. Steve is upset when Michelle plans to go away without him and Janice gets reacquainted with Roger.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Leannes hopes of owning her own restaurant are seemingly dashed by Carlas refusal to join the venture, while Roy worries Hayley is working too hard.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: A Canadian officer is brought to Downton for recuperation and disrupts everything. Ethel hears distressing news, Bates makes another attempt to settle matters with Vera, while Carson receives a tempting offer. Matthew gets used to life in a wheelchair with Mary as his round-the-clock carer. Costume drama, starring Amy Nuttall, Brendan Coyle, Jim Carter, Dan Stevens and Michelle Dockery

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: With Louisa visiting her mother in Spain to get some perspective on their marriage, Martin knows he needs to try to change for the sake of their relationship, so he endeavours to keep his promise to her to see a therapist. Aunt Ruth arranges an appointment for him with Dr Rachel Timoney, but a lifeboat training exercise causes problems for the doctor. Will he get back in time for his first session? Martin Clunes stars

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A suitcase inexplicably disappears from the wreck of a crashed car - and it is not long before parcels of cash start being delivered to the residents of Aidensfield. As the mystery unravels the police investigations lead to Bernie, who may hold the key to identifying the villages very own Robin Hood. Jason Durr stars

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: As Christmas comes to Aidensfield, the locals have their very own Scrooge to contend with in the shape of mean-spirited bank manager Gordon Stringer. With farmer Jack Dugdale at his mercy and Greengrass on the prowl for money he is owed, his son Noel becomes fed up of taking the flak for his fathers unpopularity and runs away. Drama, starring Jason Durr, Bill Maynard, Mark Jordon and Tricia Penrose

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Blue Train
programme.desc: The sleuth finds himself in interesting company as English socialites and American millionaires rub shoulders on board a train bound for the French Riviera. Passengers include oil magnate Rufus Van Aldin (Elliott Gould) and his daughter Ruth (Jaime Murray) - to whom he has given a magnificent ruby known as the Heart of Fire. With members of the aristocracy crammed into a confined space with their husbands, lovers and a renowned gemstone, murder cannot be far away. With Lindsay Duncan, Roger Lloyd Pack and James DArcy

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.desc: Richard Abernethie is found dead shortly after disinheriting his sole heir and specifying that his legacy is to be divided equally among the remaining family members. Poirot is called in by his solicitor friend Gilbert Entwhistle, to ascertain whether the late Mr Abernethie met with foul play - and also finds time to investigate the murder of a beneficiary under the new terms of the will. Whodunit, starring David Suchet, with Robert Bathurst, Anna Calder-Marshall and Geraldine James

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: A boys body is discovered in a warehouse, in circumstances which could point to either suicide or murder. Dr Tony Hill takes on the case when DCI Carol Jordan is injured in an attempted mugging - and two more childrens corpses are discovered. Psychological thriller, starring Robson Green and Hermione Norris, with Mark Letheren and Emma Handy

programme.desc: Leanne considers returning to escorting to raise money for the restaurant. Fiz regrets playing a trick on Hayley at the factory.

programme.desc: As the residents try to return to normal life following the armistice, a new development stuns them. Costume drama, starring Iain Glen, Joanne Froggatt, Brendan Coyle and Rob James-Collier

programme.desc: Al welcomes his first fishing guests, but an uninvited one means that a good review is definitely not guaranteed, while Bert decides to try to rejuvenate trade at the restaurant by joining an online voucher scheme. Morwenna asks Martin for a pay rise, and Louisa has to find a new babysitter to look after James Henry and reluctantly decides to offer Janice a trial. Penhale is excited to receive his new police issue Taser, but Portwenn does not exactly offer him plenty of opportunities to try it out. Comedy drama, starring Martin Clunes

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Maggies suspicions are aroused by the death of a close friends mother, so she goes straight to the police to report her fears, leading to a cruel dilemma. The district nurses emotional day comes to an end when she announces her decision to leave Aidensfield, prompting the locals to throw a farewell party. Meanwhile, jealousy rears its ugly head when one of Blaketons old flames comes back on the scene and starts taking an interest in Lord Ashfordly. Rural drama, starring Kazia Pelka, Derek Fowlds and Janie Dee

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Lives are put on the line as Mike and Jackie receive orders to provide a refuge for a dangerous police informant, and David is left in charge of Greengrasss house while the old rogue is living it up in the Caribbean _ but does not count on an unexpected visitor making himself at home. Drama, starring Fiona Dolman, Jason Durr and Geoffrey Hughes

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.desc: Crime writer Ariadne Oliver (My Familys Zoe Wanamaker) and four known killers are among those who meet Poirot at a bridge evening arranged by wealthy adventurer Shaitana, who sits out the first game - only to be found later stabbed through the heart. As nobody has left or entered the victims apartment during the night, the guests combine their skills to discover which of the party is responsible. Whodunit, starring David Suchet, with Lesley Manville and Alex Jennings

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.desc: Millionaire Gordon Cloades wife is widowed for the second time at the tender age of 23, arousing the suspicions of his impoverished relatives. Fanning the flames of envy and hatred, psychic aunt Kathy Cloade reveals the grieving widows first husband is in fact still alive, and a second death prompts Poirot to delve deeper into the familys dark secrets. David Suchet stars, with Jenny Agutter, Tim Piggot-Smith and Celia Imrie

programme.desc: Tonys suspicions are aroused by his latest PhD student, a notorious double murderer known as `Mack the Knife", who has been released from prison claiming to have reformed. programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off in Falmouth, Cornwall, where Gaye Woods hopes her family run Meudon Hotel will win the day. However, guests Tim and Mikey think their twin beds are too close for comfort. For some afternoon fun, Gaye lays on some oyster shucking. At dinner, some of the group are unconvinced by the high room rates and at breakfast, guests Sue and Chris reveal a picky streak. When Gaye receives her feedback, shes left wanting answers

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to the Royal Oak pub in Malborough, Devon, run by laid-back owner Tim Heap, with help from his barman Mikey Martindale. The basic rooms are a hit with some guests, but Geoff and Joan discover a mucky corner cupboard. Tim and Mikey take the group to an art workshop for some creative fun. At dinner, the guests are itching to know more about Tims past and he doesnt disappoint, but hes riled when Gaye questions his unconventional management style. Following some unwanted extras at breakfast, some tough feedback makes Tim suspicious

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit is to the Angel Guest House in Tiverton, Devon, where owners Chris and Sue Holliday have created a homespun experience. Gaye is concerned by the noise of the road outside, and Joan and Geoff question some design choices in their room. During an afternoon playing a local game known as Throw the Egg, the group rumbles how competitive their hosts are. At dinner, Tims enthusiasm results in an unexpected gift. Egg connoisseur Chriss poached eggs are put to the test at breakfast

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The fourth visit is to Geoff Jones and Joan McGowans Compton Swan in Newbury, Berkshire. Expectations are high after Joan revealed she was named Irelands Businesswoman of the Year on the last visit, but Tim, whos still smarting from his feedback, goes to town on his room. Tensions mount during an afternoon on an inflatable racecourse, where Chris and Sue try to sabotage the race. Geoff and Joan impress with a harpist at dinner and hearts are softened when they reveal the personal sacrifices they make for their business. At breakfast, Geoff the chef impresses, but egg-man Chris takes issues with his food

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Car S.O.S.

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau
programme.sub-title: Chickens, Heating and a Blank Canvas
programme.desc: Dick and Angel decide they will live as self-sufficiently as they can while restoring the chateau, and invest in some chickens to provide them with eggs for breakfast every morning. However, they still have countless problems to deal with, and have only £20,000 left to spend on the project. The chateau is still without either heating or water, while the 59 windows are crumbling. While Dicks renovations fall behind schedule, Angel is in her element coming up with ideas for what the finished building will look like

programme.title: The Dog House Australia

programme.title: The Dog House

Elsewhere, its a rollercoaster of emotions as beloved long-term resident Lady, a Staffie cross, finally has a chance of finding a home after a year of searching

programme.title: Perfect Pub Walks
programme.sub-title: Perfect Pub Walks with Alexander Armstrong

Chris talks openly about some of his struggles and difficulties, while Alexander speaks movingly about his own experiences with his sons autism

programme.desc: This edition features stories of human compassion and kindness in the most challenging circumstances. Dafne the sausage dog is pining after losing her human soulmate - and is not sold on plucky papillon cross Woodys moves to impress her. programme.title: The Shape of Water
programme.desc: Elisa Esposito is a mute singleton who lives above a cinema. Although friends with Giles, a neighbouring artist, she lives a lonely existence. While he has designs on the cafe worker nearby, Elisa cleans up at top-secret government lab, a bus ride away in Baltimore, Maryland. One day in 1962, she makes a life-changing discovery when Elisa finds an amphibious humanoid creature who is being held captive, and they embark on an extraordinary relationship. Guillermo del Toros Oscar and Bafta-winning fantasy, starring Sally Hawkins, Michael Shannon, Octavia Spencer and Doug Jones

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: A look at the specialist team dedicated to caring for people when they suffer the potentially devastating consequences of a stroke, including 77-year-old Alex. Meanwhile, doctors examine 66-year-old Steven, who has been admitted with severe stomach cramps

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Two families come to terms with life-changing events, including the relatives of eight-year-old Junior, who has an open leg fracture and suspected internal bleeding after being knocked off his bike by a car. His mum Bekki reveals how Junior learned to cope with extraordinary setbacks and how she worries about his future because of health problems of her own. Meanwhile, 46-year-old Anthony arrives in AandE after suffering chest pains during a day out at the races. programme.desc: Diesel is a hearing dog for his teenage owner, Rayane, who is deaf. This means he does not hear everything. Rayane is playing the detective in the drama club play, and Diesel is going to be right by his side as his trusty police dog. At the theatre, Diesel helps Rayane and his friend Grace practise for something called a cue - their big moment to go on stage. programme.title: How to Cook Well in Morocco
programme.desc: Rory OConnell arrives in Marrakesh late at night, but still in time to join the traders, hawkers and visitors who throng Jamaa El Fna, the citys main square. The next day, he takes a food tour with Amanda Mouttaki, from Moroccan Food Adventures, and cooks a tanjia - a stew not to be confused with a tagine. Rory also advises viewers how to buy genuine spices and avoid the fake, highly coloured ones

programme.title: Nevens Ulster Food Tour
programme.desc: Neven Maguire heads to Bundoran in Donegal to meet Irelands first professional surfer Richie Fitzgerald. They talk about the towns love of surfing and the strong influence it has had on Bundorans cafe culture. He also visits a family-run bakery on the edge of Laghey village, learns about hand-crafted gin in the Boatyard Distillery in Enniskillen and visits Belleek Pottery, where he has a go at creating and painting his own piece

programme.title: RTÉ News: Nine OClock and Weather

programme.title: Build Your Own Home
programme.desc: Builder Harrison Gardner helps obstetrician Joan Lennon and her German partner Andrea Kowarschik, who are currently living in a campervan beside Joans home town of Belturbet, Co Cavan, while they renovate two adjoining stone cottages, adding a timber frame extension to the rear for office space

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Line of Duty star Vicky McClure researches her ancestry, beginning by trying to find out why her paternal grandmother Nonna Jean was given up by her family when she was a child. Vicky also looks into the background of her mothers grandfather Harry Millership, who died in a Japanese PoW camp in the Second World War

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: A fishing trawler heads out to sea with three brothers and their ailing stepmother aboard. When it returns to Shipton Abbott harbour several hours later, only the three fishermen remain. A note found on deck suggests the woman took her own life. As her estranged daughter comes to town to help make funeral arrangements, the simple case grows more complex. Elsewhere, the day of the house visit arrives, though its no plain sailing for Humphrey and Martha. Detective drama, starring Kris Marshall, Sally Bretton, Zahra Ahmadi and Peter Davison

programme.title: Dolphins: Wonders of the Ocean
programme.desc: Part two of two. Ken OSullivan travels west of Kerry and finds new dolphin species in clear blue water. Over the years of ocean exploration, he works out where the fertile areas of the ocean are, and his journeys bring him into contact with some of the largest creatures ever to have lived. The story takes a dark turn as Ken discovers thousands of dolphins are being killed every year in the Northeast Atlantic, many of them in Irish waters

programme.title: David Puttnam: The Long Way Home
programme.desc: An intimate portrait of Oscar winning film producer David Puttnam as he reflects on his life and the influences which shaped his journey to becoming an Irish citizen

programme.sub-title: Contested Identities: The Coming of the English
programme.desc: Examining the ways in which Ireland changed after the arrival of the Normans, the catastrophes caused by the Black Death and the Protestant reformation in the Tudor era that led to Irish people spreading across Europe and the country creating a strong connection with Spain due to their religions

programme.desc: Eoin Warner explores the native woodland of Clare Island, and as he sails his Galway hooker through Connemaras waters, he finds Irelands only native reptile on the Aran Islands. He also encounters dozens of basking sharks off the Clare coast engaged in an extraordinary breeding display

programme.title: Kayak o Thuaidh
programme.desc: Novice kayakers Tessa Fleming and Irial Ó Ceallaigh join expert paddler John Hubbocks on an epic journey along the northern coast of Ireland. Tessa and Irial undergo difficult training sessions on the shores of Co Down before beginning their adventure in the tranquil quay in Bunbeg in north-west Co Donegal, heading out to Gabhla island, where Tessa learns about its sombre abandonment and the encouraging signs of a brighter future for returnees. Drama set during the 1920s, starring Steve Buscemi, Kelly Macdonald and Michael Shannon

programme.desc: Nucky leans on special investigator Gaston Means to ensure political aide Jess Smith is silenced, before enlisting Owen to neutralise Gyp Rosettis alliance with Mafia don Joe Masseria in New York. Van Aldens business plan hits the buffers in Chicago, and Margaret considers how to make the most of the future. Drama, starring Steve Buscemi and Michael Shannon

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: A prison riot breaks out and two inmates are killed. Richard Belzer stars

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Lewis tackles a drug-related homicide with a little help from a female detective in narcotics. Meanwhile, Frank misses passing his test by four points. Gritty police drama, following the lives of the detective division on the streets of Baltimore, starring Richard Belzer

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Bran trains with the Three-Eyed Raven, while in the north of Westeros at Castle Black, the Nights Watch stands behind Alliser Thorne. Fantasy drama, starring Isaac Hempstead-Wright and Owen Teale

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: While Daenerys meets her future, Bran meets the past. Elsewhere, Tommen confronts the High Sparrow, and Arya continues her training. Starring Emilia Clarke, Maisie Williams and Isaac Hempstead-Wright

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After Dina shares crucial intelligence information, Ellie prepares to petition the town council. Near Seattle, a religious group flees a war. Post-apocalyptic drama, starring Bella Ramsey

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: In Seattle, Ellie and Dina find themselves amid a brutal battle between the zealous Seraphites and a ruthless militia

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: The family throw Paulie a party as he is released from jail, Tony and Ralph ignore sensible financial advice and Adriana decides to get married before it is too late. Tony Sirico stars

programme.title: Dexter: New Blood
programme.desc: Dexter and Harrison find themselves closer than ever over Christmas break, and Angela starts to wonder if Iron Lake is not the safe place she always thought it was

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Carrie has an encounter with Mr Rabbits right-hand man Olek, while an increasingly suspicious Gordon is intent on finding out exactly what she is hiding from him. Proctor pays a visit to his estranged family when his niece Rebecca is kicked out of her home and Alexs sister Nola comes to see him

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The fantasy drama continues as Tyrion strikes a deal, while Jorah and Daario undertake a difficult task as they seek to catch up with Daenerys. Back across the Narrow Sea, Jaime and Cersei try to improve their situation. Starring Peter Dinklage, Iain Glen, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Lena Headey

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrions agenda in Slavers Bay sees him seeking a new, strange ally. In the North, Brienne goes on a mission, while in Braavos, Arya is given a chance to prove herself. Beyond the Wall, Bran makes progress with his mystical tuition, learning a great deal in the process. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Gwendoline Christie, Maisie Williams and Isaac Hempstead Wright

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Brixham residents raise money for a statue to commemorate fishermen lost at sea, but Pat Seddons plan to support the cause by participating in a fundraising skydive worries her friends and relatives. Jan Hart goes trawling for scallops, and shares some ancient superstitions

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Pat Seddon considers selling up and visits a clairvoyant, while celebrity chef Mitch Tonks makes an appearance at Brixhams Crab Festival

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogram the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: A young lad is transported to a parallel universe where he is caught in a battle between a mysterious gunslinger and a sinister sorcerer. Fantasy adventure based on the Stephen King novels, starring Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey and Tom Taylor

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Normandy landings, a group of American soldiers scours the battlefields of France in search of a missing infantryman, who has been given compassionate leave to return home because his brothers have been killed in the conflict. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns, Matt Damon, Barry Pepper and Vin Diesel. It won five Academy Awards, including Best Cinematography, Best Film Editing, and Best Director. The film makers also took home a couple of Baftas for Best Sound and Best Special Effects

programme.title: Old Guy
programme.desc: An ageing hitman must train a young prodigy when his employer moves to replace the old guard. Director Simon Wests comedy, starring Christoph Waltz, Lucy Liu and Cooper Hoffman

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving the crew of the disabled vessel trapped at the bottom of the Pacific. Rescue diver Jonas Taylor is hired to save the crew from a 75ft-long prehistoric shark, known as the Megalodon. Director Jon Turteltaubs action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Bingbing Li, Rainn Wilson and Ruby Rose

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: English nobleman Robin of Locksley returns home from fighting in the Crusades, only to discover that his father has been murdered and his lands seized, while the local people are living in fear under the tyrannical rule of the Sheriff of Nottingham. Branded an outlaw for his defiance, Robin and his Moorish travelling companion go into hiding in the forest, where they recruit a group of bandits to fight for justice, protect the downtrodden, and foil the Sheriffs plan to seize the throne while the king is away at war. Medieval action adventure, starring Kevin Costner, Alan Rickman, Morgan Freeman, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Christian Slater and Mike McShane

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: During the 14th century, William Tell defends his family and his homeland of Switzerland after the Austrian King invades. Historical drama, starring Claes Bang, Connor Swindells, Ben Kingsley and Jonathan Pryce

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: A young lad is transported to a parallel universe where he is caught in a battle between a mysterious gunslinger and a sinister sorcerer. Fantasy adventure based on the Stephen King novels, starring Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey and Tom Taylor

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: An assassin tries to make amends in an attempt to restore the sight of a beautiful young singer. Director/Producer John Woos remake of his namesake 1989 thriller, starring Nathalie Emmanuel, Omar Sy and Sam Worthington

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Motorcycle stuntman Johnny Blaze sells his soul to diabolical Mephistopheles to save the life of his father. His bargain dooms him to pass each night as Ghost Rider, a demonic skeletal biker bound to take evil souls to Hell. However, conflict between Mephistopheles and his son offers Johnny the chance to win back his humanity. Fantasy thriller based on the comic-book, starring Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes and Wes Bentley

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert

Medieval action adventure, starring Kevin Costner, Alan Rickman, Morgan Freeman, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Christian Slater and Mike McShane

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: While driving his kids to school, Matt Turner, a Berlin-based American businessman, learns that his vehicle is rigged with explosives. Director Nimrod Antals thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Noma Dumezweni and Jack Champion

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Motorcycle stuntman Johnny Blaze sells his soul to diabolical Mephistopheles to save the life of his father. His bargain dooms him to pass each night as Ghost Rider, a demonic skeletal biker bound to take evil souls to Hell. However, conflict between Mephistopheles and his son offers Johnny the chance to win back his humanity. Fantasy thriller based on the comic-book, starring Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes and Wes Bentley

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freyas army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravennas wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Conservationist Sergei Kravinoffs complex relationship with his ruthless father, Nikolai, sets him on a path of vengeance with brutal consequences, motivating him to become Kraven, the worlds most feared hunter. Fantasy adventure, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Russell Crowe and Ariana Debose

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Ancient titans Godzilla and Kong clash in an epic battle against an undiscovered threat hidden within the Earth. Director Adam Wingards blockbusting fantasy adventure, starring Rebecca Hall, Dan Stevens and Brian Tyree Henry

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: An assassin tries to make amends in an attempt to restore the sight of a beautiful young singer. Director/Producer John Woos remake of his namesake 1989 thriller, starring Nathalie Emmanuel, Omar Sy and Sam Worthington

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
